BlackStorm:

BlackStorm shuddered when she saw the scar she added "How did 
Flicker capture me??? Are you sure that he only was scaping from 
maximan and use me as hostage or I was his target?"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Hamre Will <kaiserponth@y...> wrote:
> ::Hevn::
>      "Your daughter should be fine.  I left her with her father 
and the rest of the Maximals when I came after you.  Which, I might 
add, was not the best move I could've made.  At least from a 
selfpreservation standpoint."  He turns around and shows Blackstorm 
his back.  Despite the healing effects of the CR chambers the scars 
are still visible from the shots he took there.  He then turns back 
around.  "Needless to say I failed to rescue you."
>
